pages.text: Want to use your stuff even when you're away from home? Check out these wireless storage options.
Simple Storage Networks is just what it says, simple storage. It offers wireless access up to and including unlimited range across dimensions WITH crafting. But you gotta work for that.

The RFTool Storage Tablet can provide multidimentional storage access and crafting. It is a more complex setup and requires a small amount of power, but can provide a large storage system in a smaller space.
